      • scaleByWidth

        public Path scaleByWidth(Path source,
                         Path target,
                         int targetWidth)
                  throws IOException
        Scale method, see ImageScaler documentation for general information.
        Specified by:
        scaleByWidth in interface ImageScaler
        Parameters:
        source - the source file
        target - the target file. If the file exists, it will be overwritten.
        targetWidth - the target width. The height is calculated with a constant aspect ratio.
        Returns:
        the path of the target file.
        Throws:
        IOException - error during the scaling process.

      • scaleByBox

        public Path scaleByBox(Path source,
                       Path target,
                       Rectangle border)
                throws IOException
        Scale method, see ImageScaler documentation for general information.
        Specified by:
        scaleByBox in interface ImageScaler
        Parameters:
        source - the source file
        target - the target file. If the file exists, it will be overwritten.
        border - the target size. The height and width is calculated with a constant aspect ratio. One value is the same like the box the other value is equals or smaller.
        Returns:
        the path of the target file.
        Throws:
        IOException - error during the scaling process.

      • scaleByBox

        public Map<Rectangle,Path> scaleByBox(Path source,
                                      Path targetFolder,
                                      List<Rectangle> borders)
                               throws IOException
        Scale method, see ImageScaler documentation for general information.
        Creates a collection of images from the same source image.
        Specified by:
        scaleByBox in interface ImageScaler
        Parameters:
        source - the source file
        targetFolder - the target file. If the file exists, it will be overwritten.
        borders - the target sizes. The height and width is calculated with a constant aspect ratio. One value is the same like the box the other value is equals or smaller.
        Returns:
        a Map with the calculated target sizes and the created target files.
        Throws:
        IOException - error during the scaling process.

      • scaleByBox

        public Map<Rectangle,Path> scaleByBox(Path source,
                                      Path targetFolder,
                                      List<Rectangle> borders,
                                      ImageFormat targetFormat,
                                      MetadataProvider metadataProvider)
                               throws IOException
        Scale method, see ImageScaler documentation for general information.
        Creates a collection of images from the same source image.
        Specified by:
        scaleByBox in interface ImageScaler
        Parameters:
        source - the source file
        targetFolder - the target file. If the file exists, it will be overwritten.
        borders - the target sizes. The height and width is calculated with a constant aspect ratio. One value is the same like the box the other value is equals or smaller.
        targetFormat - the image target format
        metadataProvider - the MetadataProvider to write the target image metadata
        Returns:
        a Map with the calculated target sizes and the created target files.
        Throws:
        IOException - error during the scaling process.

      • scale

        public void scale(Path sourceFile,
                  Function<Rectangle,Iterable<Rectangle>> borderCalculation,
                  IOExFunction<Rectangle,OutputStream> outputProvider)
           throws IOException
        Scale an image into a collection of images. It is a low level method.
        Specified by:
        scale in interface ImageScaler
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - the source file
        borderCalculation - Function which returns the target box sizes. Input is the original size from the source file. Has to return an Iterable of target sizes.
        outputProvider - Function which provide the concrete OutputStream for an target image. Input is the target size provided from the borderCalculation parameter. Has to return a OutputStream. Attention: This stream is closed inside the method. Function can throw an IOException which stops the conversion. This exception is thrown by this method.
        Throws:
        IOException - An error occurs. Can throw during reading the source image, providing a target OutputStream or writing into this stream.

      • scale

        public void scale(Path sourceFile,
                  Function<Rectangle,Iterable<Rectangle>> borderCalculation,
                  ImageFormat targetFormat,
                  MetadataProvider metadataProvider,
                  IOExFunction<Rectangle,OutputStream> outputProvider)
           throws IOException
        Scale an image into a collection of images. It is a low level method.
        Specified by:
        scale in interface ImageScaler
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - the source file
        borderCalculation - Function which returns the target box sizes. Input is the original size from the source file. Has to return an Iterable of target sizes.
        targetFormat - the image target format
        metadataProvider - the MetadataProvider to write the target image metadata
        outputProvider - Function which provide the concrete OutputStream for an target image. Input is the target size provided from the borderCalculation parameter. Has to return a OutputStream. Attention: This stream is closed inside the method. Function can throw an IOException which stops the conversion. This exception is thrown by this method.
        Throws:
        IOException - An error occurs. Can throw during reading the source image, providing a target OutputStream or writing into this stream.
